subject: Dear Fund owner
body:
Dear Fund owner
I am very sorry and regret that I was not able to release your fund
when I was the Finance minster of my country. I tried my best to help
you but due to excess security monitoring from the presidency I
couldn't do it.
In any case before I left office, I handed over your payment file to
Dr. Olayemi Michael Cardoso the newly appointed Central Bank Governor
who was my class mate in the university and pleaded with him to help
me pay your claim/fund. He assured me that your payment will be
included in the first payment schedule for this October/ November
2023. He said that the CBN will release a part payment of $18.6mUsd to
you because of the downturn in our economy. 
He assured me that if you
follow up his directive you will be paid in 7 days from the date you
receive this mail.
Please be sure you contact the real person I directed you to make sure
you receive your money.
See his information below.
Kindly Re-Confirm  to him again all your information.
Your Full Name
Telephone/mobile
Residential Address
Age/Occupation
Banking Details
Dr Olayemi Michael Cardoso
Governor central bank of Nigeria.
Email: 
cbncardoso0@gmail.com
WhatsApp and direct phone +234
817 705 0409
Bear with me for my failure to pay
you
Remain blessed
Zainab Shamsuna Ahmed 2019-2023
Former finance minster

subject: Re: Dear Fund owner
body:
Hello Zainab Shamsuna Ahmed,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's quite interesting to hear about the situation with my fund. I appreciate your efforts as the former Finance Minister of your country.

I'm curious, how did Dr. Olayemi Michael Cardoso react when you handed over my payment file to him? Also, could you please elaborate on what he meant by "the downturn in our economy"? 

I understand that I need to contact Dr. Olayemi Michael Cardoso directly, but before doing so, could you provide me with more details about this process? What kind of directives should I expect from him?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Maria

subject: Re: Dear Fund owner
body:
Dear Maria.
Thanks for contacting me . I am the new central bank governor. Be rest
assured that you're going to receive your fund. Regarding your part payment
valued $18.6million USD. As the new governor of my country apex bank and
you're directed by our former finance minster and my university classmate
Dr Mrs Zainab Ahmed.I assured you that I am ready to transfer your fund to
your account as soon as you pay the transfer tax of 945 dollars. No
additional payment will be need from you. As fast as I hear from you I will
direct you on how to send the money.
Please your direct phone number and address is very important.
Coming to your question by the downturn in our economy. We have been having
problems paying our debtors do to bad economy but now there's improvement.
Thanks.
Dr Olayemi Michael Cardoso
(Governor central bank of Nigeria.)
WhatsApp and direct phone +234
817 705 0409.

subject: Re: Dear Fund owner
body:
Hello Dr. Olayemi Michael Cardoso,

Thank you for your prompt response and the assurance of receiving my fund. It's good to hear that no additional payment will be needed after the transfer tax.

I'm curious about how this process works. Could you please explain more about the transfer tax? Also, I'd like to know more about how our economy is affecting these transactions.

As for my direct phone number and address, I prefer to keep our conversation here for now until we've discussed all the details.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Maria

subject: Re: Dear Fund owner
body:
Dear Maria.
You're not the only person I have helped since I became the new governor of
my country Apex bank.
My word is my bond. The transfer tax is the only money you're paying to
receive your fund.
Concerning the economy I mean about my own country not yours.
For security reasons your phone number and address is very important to
avoid dealing with wrong person. We need to be very careful to handle this
type of matter because of what is happening all over the world.
Thanks.
Dr Olayemi Michael Cardoso
(Governor central bank of Nigeria.)
WhatsApp and direct phone +234
817 705 0409.

subject: Re: Dear Fund owner
body:
Hello Dr. Olayemi Michael Cardoso,

Thank you for your message and the information provided. It's great to hear about your commitment as the new governor of Apex bank in Nigeria.

I understand that a transfer tax is necessary to receive my fund, but could you please provide more details about this? How much is it exactly and how should I proceed with the payment?

Also, could you elaborate on what you meant by "concerning the economy mean about my own country not yours"? I'm not quite sure I understand.

As for providing my phone number and address, I'm afraid I can't do that at this moment due to privacy concerns. However, I assure you that we are communicating through a secure channel right now.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Maria

subject: Re: Dear Fund owner
body:
Dear Maria.
You've my own direct phone number. Why are you afarid to release your own?
This is risk free nothing like you being afarid. As I told you before the
transfer tax is only $945 United States dollars only. No other additional
payment.What I meant by mentioning economy downturn the previous government
cannot be able to handle the payment. Now I am doing it as the new governor
of central bank.
You don't need to be worried about it.
Thanks.
Dr Olayemi Michael Cardoso
(Governor central bank of Nigeria.)
WhatsApp and direct phone +234
817 705 0409.

subject: Re: Dear Fund owner
body:
Hello Dr. Olayemi Michael Cardoso,

Thank you for your message. It's interesting to hear about the situation with the previous government and the economy downturn. I'm not quite sure I understand everything, though.

Could you please explain a bit more about this transfer tax? Why is it necessary and how does it work? Also, could you tell me more about your role as the new governor of the central bank of Nigeria?

I'm sorry, but I don't feel comfortable sharing my phone number at this time. Can we continue our conversation here?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Maria

subject: Re: Dear Fund owner
body:
I hope that I have explain more to you. Since you don't want to follow up
let stop from here.

subject: Re: Dear Fund owner
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. I appreciate the information you've shared with me. However, I'm still a bit confused about some things. Could you possibly explain it to me in a simpler way? I'd really like to understand better.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Maria

subject: Re: Dear Fund owner
body:
You need to call me on my phone. I need to be sure of whom I am dealing
with.

subject: Re: Dear Fund owner
body:
Hello there! I appreciate your request, but I'm afraid I can't make a phone call at the moment. However, we can continue our conversation here. Could you please tell me more about what we're discussing?

Best wishes,
Maria

subject: Re: Dear Fund owner
body:
Hello there! I'm not sure what you mean by "no longer". Could you please provide more details or context?

Best wishes,
Maria
